phrases: Fairy Tail used to be on top!
Big words from somebody who was too busy pubhopping to cheer her teammates on.
Even all the pubs have Lacrima Vision.
Well, let us raise a mug to our crushing defeat!
What a disaster of a day...
We would all better get our act together from tomorrow.
And I will turn things around for us, you will see!
If the Salamander's going to be in the game, maybe I will join in, too...
I would say it is high time you showed'them the results of your training.
Lu-chan and Gray are not here?
Now that you mention it, I have not seen'them...
I am not surprised, the way they lost...
They probably do not want to be seen right now.
I do not know about that.
Both of them were cool in my eyes.
I could say the same thing to you.
I hear everybody's gathered at a nearby pub.
It is a pain in the ass, but I am going to at least pop in...
What will I do if that happens?!
As always, you have got a fertile imagination.
And this time, it was long!
In fact, this has pumped me up even more!
Looks like they are still under the weather...
Today's defeat is the seed for tomorrow's victory!
Because we do not know the meaning of the words give up!
Aim for number one in Fiore!
Is that really the guild that was shut out today?
The first day of the Grand Magic Games has come to a successful end.
Yes, there were some fine magic battles.
I have come to ask if you have any requests for the second day's battle part.
I would like to see Bacchus.
I am sure it will make a rousing match.
If there is nothing else, then I shall take my leave...
Thank you for your trouble, Captain of the Guard.
I do not have time to rest, Your Majesty.
Now when it is so close to completion...
Come on, let us cheer up with a little throwdown!
How did he get this strong in just three months?!
I will take you up on that.
Once you and Natsu get started, it is not going to be a game.
Hey, your head's really gotten rounder, Laxus!
How dare you do that to Laxus?!
Right now, our pride is being trampled!
You are a strong drinker, huh, doll?
Why do not we see who is stronger?
I do not know who you are,
but you are challenging me to a drinking match?
I do not know who you are, but do not do it!
Do not let her looks fool you, that woman's a monster!
Someone drank Cana under the table?!
This is the first time I have seen Cana flat on the floor like that!
I am takin' this as a trophy.
What the hell are you doing?!
You are a fine babe as always.
It is been a long time.
I hear you were gone for seven years?
It seems you are not participating in the Grand Magic Games...
Well, I thought I would leave it to the young'uns this time,
but after watching War Cry's pitiful match,
my man's soul could not stay silent!
So under the reserve member provision, I joined the team.
My soul is trembling with excitement.
If we get to clash tomorrow or after,
I would like to settle things from that one time.
I was hopin' for a little more than that, Erza!
He is an S Class wizard from Quatro Cerberus.
We used to run into each other a lot while out on jobs.
I know his strength very well.
We have fought several times, but never to a decisive conclusion.
He is as strong as you, Erza?!
What, that was a long time ago!
There is no way he could beat Erza now!
You do not even know that Erza's going to fight!
I could take him on, too...
Like always, it was just fragments, but I saw...
A sight that I could not believe...
And now, what you have all been waiting for, the second day of the Grand Magic Games has begun!
Our guest on this second day is renowned reporter for the Weekly Sorcerer, Jason-san!
Okay, the competition part has already begun!
This competition takes place on top of a line of vehicles,
with the idea being to reach the goal without falling off!
As the vehicles are always moving,
just one moment of carelessness could lead to a misstep!
The vehicles will wend their way around the sightseeing spots of Crocus,
but which team will arrive here at Domus Flau?!
Everyone in the stadium, you can watch the race here on Lacrima Vision!
who could have predicted this turn of events?!
Why did Natsu sign up for this?!
You would think he would have been able to tell what kind of event it was from the name, Chariot!
Once he made up his mind to do it, he does not listen.
He probably thought he would be fighting the chariots themselves...
is a groggy-looking Natsu from Fairy Tail A!
This is not going to work...
Right in front of him is Gajeel from Fairy Tail B
and even Sting from Sabertooth, all moving like molasses!
What is going on here, Yajima-san?
I suppose the three of them have something in common.
And a member of Saber, too...
I never thought the invincible Sting-kun's one weakness would be revealed...
Alright, let us check in with the leaders of the pack!
It is a fierce dead heat at the front!
In the lead is Blacksnake of Raven Tail!
Ichiya of Blue Pegasus is on his heels,
followed by Yuuka of Lamia Scale
I am surprised you can keep up with that body type!
Some distance behind them is Bacchus from the reserve squad of Quatro Cerberus!
Have not thrown off the effects of last night's booze yet...
You cannot use magic while you are in my shockwave!
She avoided the surge by running on the side of the vehicle!
Maybe I will try a little harder, too!
Bacchus used his power to destroy the vehicles!
He is more powerful than he was seven years ago...
If you fall, you are out!
He is underestimating a chubby girl...
And just like that, he crossed the goal line first!
Cerberus had a man like this...?!
In second place, Blacksnake of Raven Tail!
All that is left are these three, battling it out at the bottom ranks!
I never had any problem with transportation before...
Is this what he meant by making it fun?
He is not trying to be funny, right, Rogue?
Slayers get motion sick on vehicles...
I thought it was just Sting and me...
I think it is obvious by this point.
even though you cannot draw on any power...
I will give this match to you.
After this one, we are going to keep winning anyway.
We are not going to miss one or two points.
Do not cry about that one point later, kid!
Would you answer me one thing?
Why did you decide to participate in the tournament?
I would not believe you were the same Fairy Tail from back in the day.
Are you worried about the strength of your guild?
The Fairy Tail that I know
They did everything at their own pace...
They did not give a damn about what people thought of them.
No matter how painful it was...
Even if people made fun of'them...
And now we are going to show everyone...
Natsu of Fairy Tail A, 2 points for being in sixth place!
Gajeel of Fairy Tail B, 1 point for seventh place!
They are tenacious, I will give'them that!
I think I might cheer them on...
I am going to be rooting for you guys from now on!
And Sabertooth's Sting gets 0 points for dropping out!
Alright, now Raven Tail is in first place!
Sabertooth has dropped to second place!
I think it is Sting's fault...
There is nothing to worry about with him.
Are you back to normal, Carla?
Everyone is waiting, so I will be going.
You do not intend to say anything?
What good would telling her about that future do?
There is no way she would believe me.
When you do not believe it yourself,
certainly other people would not believe it.
I do not believe that stuff!
Okay, on to the much-anticipated battle part!
In the first match is Blacksnake of Raven Tail, a new guild that is currently the front runner,
It is a confrontation between snake and dog!
I hope we see a fair fight.
Looks like Leon and that dog-like guy are going to be in it.
Do not you ever disgrace us like that again.
Who do you think you owe your victory to?
But Blondie was glaring at me...
Would you like to be struck again?
Super Paralysis Claw Mega Mega Jellyfish!
So he can mimic the properties of anyone's magic!
It is not my real name...
It is not your real name?!
If I win, you are tellin' me your real name!
That is fine, but what if I win?
I will tell you a secret about myself!
Apparently, they have made a weird bet.
I am not interested in learning either one, though...
I like the sound of that...
And his opponent is Bacchus, huh?
That is the guy who is as strong as Erza!
And he blew everyone else away with that Chariot thing, too...
But Elfman's a man who gets serious when he gets down to it!
And I am curious about the results of his training, too!
Are you imitating the way that dog-guy talks?
I forgot my pride as a cat and imitated a dog!
What is your pride as a cat?
